com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.theme

Annotation Type Theme.ColorType


  • @Retention(value=SOURCE)
public static @interface Theme.ColorType
    Interface to hold the color type constant values according to the com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.theme.R.attr#ads_colorType.
